traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The yeti tyke has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The yeti tyke has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) slashing damage, plus 2 (1d4 damage) cold damage. Claw does both slashing and cold damage.
